attributes.action: Introduce a law  that requires the names of the English football leagues to be changed back to league divisions 1,2,3,4 and the confernce league
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: And to stop by the law the use of any other name eg:the premier league, the championship, the(insert advertisers name here)league one, as above league 2 etc. No more silly names, just league divison 1,2,3 and 4

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
